pr_title: Fix flow loops for single switch flows

timeline.message: Fix flow loops for single switch flows
Fix flow loops for single switch flows
Fix flow loops for single switch flows

timeline.bodyText: why null? why not empty list?
timeline.author: niksv
niksv

timeline.bodyText: why null? why not empty list?
timeline.author: niksv
niksv

replies.bodyText: All these methods are used only to generate regular flow rules. This factory is designed to create loop rules and should not be used for regular flow rules. So it's doesn't matter null or empty lists are used here. Maybe throw UnsupportedOperationException is the better way.
replies.author: rozdy

replies.bodyText: I do not want to block PR, but I wondering about NPEs. I agree with UnsupportedOperationException idea
replies.author: niksv

timeline.message: Fix flow loops for single switch flows

timeline.bodyText: should these 4 methods throw unsupported exceptions too?
